Wisdom: ثَمَرَةُ الْأُنْسِ بِاللَّهِ الِاسْتِيحَاشُ مِنَ النَّاسِ
enWisdom: The fruit of intimacy with Allah is keeping aloof from the people

Wisdom: مَنْ أَنِسَ بِاللَّهِ اسْتَوْحَشَ مِنَ النَّاسِ
enWisdom: One who is intimate with Allah keeps aloof from the people

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَوْحَشَ عَنِ النَّاسِ أَنِسَ بِاللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: One who keeps aloof from the people, becomes intimate with Allah, the Glorified

Wisdom: تَقَرَّبْ إِلَى اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ فَإِنَّهُ يُزْلِفُ الْمُتَقَرِّبِينَ إِلَيْهِ
enWisdom: Seek nearness to Allah, the Glorified, for verily He brings closer those who seek nearness to Him

Wisdom: التَّقَرُّبُ إِلَى اللَّهِ تَعَالَى بِمَسْأَلَتِهِ وَإِلَى النَّاسِ بِتَرْكِهَا
enWisdom: Attaining nearness to Allah is [achieved] by asking [from] Him and [gaining closeness] to the people is [achieved] by refraining from asking [them for anything]

Wisdom: الْوُصْلَةُ بِاللَّهِ فِي الِانْقِطَاعِ عَنِ النَّاسِ
enWisdom: Connecting to Allah is in severing ties with the people

Wisdom: اصْحَبْ مَنْ لَا تَرَاهُ إِلَّا وَكَأَنَّهُ لَا غَنَاءَ بِهِ عَنْكَ وَإِنْ أَسَأْتَ إِلَيْهِ أَحْسَنَ إِلَيْكَ وَكَأَنَّهُ الْمُسِي‏ءُ
enWisdom: The [true] friend is he who forbids [one from] injustice and wrongdoing while helping [one] to perform good deeds and be righteous
